alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Bedford; Rockbridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 4:29PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of south central Rockbridge, northeastern Bedford and northwestern Amherst Counties and the City of Buena Vista through 500 PM EST... At 428 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower over Coleman Falls, or over Big Island, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buena Vista... Glasgow... Forks Of Buffalo... Big Island... Coleman Falls... Pleasant View... and Snowden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central and south central Virginia.
